ticket.title: remote_function :confirm should allow escaping for customizations of messages...
ticket.original-body:
I want to allow allow custom confirm message dialog boxes for all functions dependent on remote_function. e.g.
submit_to_remote ... :confirm=>"5+5"
This should pop a dialog box with the question "10" not "5+5".
I think the fix for function = "if (confirm('#{escape_javascript(options[:confirm])}')) { #{function}; }" if options[:confirm]
is a combination of removing the single quotes and calling eval()
Basically having variable confirmation boxes allows for example to pass in model data that the user can directly read on the dialog box before the go ahead with the request
